function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of infectious particles from isolation rooms into the corridor due to lack of anterooms","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases to other areas of the built environment","Mitigation":"Installation of anterooms to serve as buffer zones between patient's rooms and corridors","Technologies":"Negative air machines, partitioning of rooms, transparent communication panels","People":"Health care workers, patients, visitors","Owner":"Health care institutions, facility management"},{"Description":"Ineffective design and construction of anterooms leading to difficulty in using PPE and disinfecting medical devices","Impact":"Increased risk of contamination and infection for health care workers and patients","Mitigation":"Thorough review of location of restrooms, sinks, patient beds, and windows when designing partitions","Technologies":"Flexible partitions, transparent communication panels, negative air machines","People":"Health care workers, facility management, infection control staff","Owner":"Health care institutions, infection control departments"},{"Description":"Inadequate size of anterooms leading to insufficient space for health care workers to operate","Impact":"Reduced effectiveness of infection control measures and increased risk of contamination","Mitigation":"Flexible design and partitioning to create adequately sized anterooms, consideration of oblique partitions","Technologies":"Flexible partitions, transparent communication panels, negative air machines","People":"Health care workers, facility management, infection control staff","Owner":"Health care institutions, infection control departments"}]}
